get.summary: Return all shop information for all shops

parameters.name: autodetect
parameters.description: Filter suitable shops using request IP

200.description: Return an object containing an array of every shop information.

get.summary: Return all categories information for all categories

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: This parameter is used to indicate in which language must be the recommendations returned to the client.

parameters.name: expanded
parameters.description: A boolean value indicating if the response nested values must be inline or an url to the resource.

200.description: Return an object containing incentives' categories and subcategories.

400.description:
Return a bad request error in case of any query parameter is missed
or a type mismatch is detected (for example expanded parameter value
is distinct to true | false).

404.description:
Return no data and 404 when no locale found matching the locale
and/or shop parameters sent.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: This parameter is used to indicate in which language must be the recommendations returned to the client.

200.description: Return an object containing an array of every shop information.

incentives.name: Secador de pelo
incentives.brief-description: This is another the short description

400.description: Return a bad request error in case of any query parameter is missed or a type mismatch is detected.

404.description: Return no data and 404 when no locale found matching the locale and/or category parameters sent.

409.description: A conflict has occurred, this panelist cannot perform this action.

get.summary: Return the minimum information of the given panelist

200.description: Return all the information about a panelist.

404.description: Return no data and 404 when the panelist is not found.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of the last version of this data
